description: dr^k.mx (2011-2014) pioneered independent internet journalism in the field of contemporary art by documenting in Spanish the artistic practice of over 100 artists, directed by Alonso Cedillo, along with Daniela Gil Esteva, Laos Salazar, and Karla Hernández. The ownership title has been split into 4 editions, each one of them by one member of the team. Own the four and you'll own the project (hosting not included). This NFT points to a backup copy on the IPFS. Contact me on twitter before buying.
